title: Wok in the Park
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Thai, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This is a family operated Asian fusion restaurant that prepares all food fresh. They know what vegan is, and have sourced vegan versions of many ingredients. They offer vegetable, mock duck, and tofu versions of almost everything on the menu. They also do gluten free dishes. The atmosphere is modern Asian casual, with hand painted murals on the walls. The entrees are $11, salads, soups and appetizers less. 100% MSG-free.
